summary: The story about a family that must maintain a insatiable grandmother.
cast: Pepe Soriano|Juan Carlos Altavista|Osvaldo Terranova|Eva Franco|Guillermo Battaglia|Nya Quesada|Nelly Tesolín|Oscar Nuñez|Pedro Martínez|Graciela Alfano|Vicente La Russa|Amanda Beitia|Aldo Bigatti|Fernando Iglesias 'Tacholas'|Horacio O'Connor|Martha Roldán|Emilio Vidal|Max Berliner|Cayetano Biondo|Roberto Dairiens|Coco Fossati|Tony Middleton|Alfredo Quesada|Mario Savino|Gustavo Segal|Héctor Ugazzio|Anita Boboso|Remedios Climent|Mario Kohout|Mario Korwell|Miguel Ángel Martínez|Fernando Ayala|Walter Korwell
title: La nona
